orig_text:
4.2. Name server operator requirements

   RFC 2870 (http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2780.txt) describes the
   requirements for operating DNS root servers."
correct_text:
4.2. Name server operator requirements

   RFC 2870 (http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2870.txt) describes the
   requirements for operating DNS root servers."
